text: Hilltop Hoods is an Australian hip hop group. They formed in 1996 in Blackwood, Adelaide, South Australia. The group was founded by Suffa (Matthew David Lambert) and MC Pressure (Daniel Howe Smith). DJ Next (Ben John Hare) also was a founder, but he left in 1999 and was replaced with DJ Debris (Barry John M. Francis). The group has had the more appearances on the Triple J Hottest 100, with 23 songs voted into the Hottest 100 since 2003. title: Hilltop Hoods
